column4: how do you make yourself owner cause i'm the only one that uses this comp and i want to have full access to read and write on files
that's exactly what Linux is designed NOT to let you do. If you need root access temporarily, prefix the command with sudo.
you have to type cd Program\ Files because Linux doesn't like spaces
you know that, once you type the first few characters, you can press tab to complete the name, right?
